scripts.test: bun run --cwd runar-ts-common test && bun run --cwd runar-ts-decorators test && bun run --cwd runar-ts-schemas test && bun run --cwd runar-ts-serializer test && bun run --cwd runar-ts-node test
scripts.test:watch: bun run --cwd runar-ts-common test --watch && bun run --cwd runar-ts-decorators test --watch && bun run --cwd runar-ts-schemas test --watch && bun run --cwd runar-ts-serializer test --watch && bun run --cwd runar-ts-node test --watch
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit --project runar-ts-common/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --project runar-ts-decorators/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --project runar-ts-schemas/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --project runar-ts-serializer/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --project runar-ts-node/tsconfig.json
scripts.ci: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run lint && bun run format:check && bun run type-check && bun run test
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run format:check && bun run type-check
scripts.fix: bun run lint:fix && bun run format
